name_full: 阿德南·拉杰夫 Adnan Al Rajeev
introduction: Adnan Al Rajeev started his journey in the visual medium, more than a decade ago. He started his career as an Assistant Director in the production house 'Chabial', founded by the reputed filmmaker Mostofa Sarwar Farooki, of Bangladesh. After the 5 years journey as an Assistant Director, Adnan Al Rajeev made his debut as a director. He is also the founder of the one of the top production houses, 'Runout Films' of Bangladesh. 'Runout Films' made nearly 1000 commercials for the last 12 years. Adnan Al Rajeev single handedly made more than 500 TV Commercials. He also honed his craft in TV & Web Fiction. He debuted as a full-fledged filmmaker with the TV film 'Ucchotoro Podartho Biggan,' back in 2008. Then he made few more TV Fictions, named; 'All Time Dourer Upor,' 'Middleclass Sentiment' & 'Bikel Belar Pakhi.' All of his works received critical acclamation from all over the country. His distinct style of filmmaking, youth based themes, family dynamics and realistic approach to the stories established him as a new age voice to be reckon with. In 2021, web film 'Youtumor,' which released in the leading OTT platform of Bangladesh, 'Chorki.' 'Youtumor' remarked his return into the film world with more cutting edge social satire and modern themes. He also directed 4 music video, for 'Coke Studio Bangla: Season 3,' in 2024.Adnan Al Rajeev expanded his filmmaking journey further, by turning into a producer. He produced more than 13 Web Films & Web series from 2021, for the leading OTT's of BD; 'Chorki,' 'Hoichoi Bangladesh.''Mohanagar 2,' 'Khachar Vetor Ochin Pakhi,' 'Network er Baire,' 'Tikit,' 'Overtrump,' 'Nikhoj,' 'Punormilone' 'Floor No 7,' 'Adhkhana Valo Chele Adha Mostan' are the most popular and critically louded ones.Adnan Al Rajeev emerged as an International Producer very recently for the short film 'Radikals.' Which has been internationally produced by the countries; Philippine, USA, Bangladesh. 'Radikals' (2024) has been officially selected to compete in the 'Semain De la Critique' category of the prestigious 'Cannes Film Festival.' Another Bangladeshi feature film titled 'Dear Maloti,' produced by him, recently selected as an official entry for the 'Cairo Film Festival.'He is now gearing up for more International projects and also to direct his own ventures, in the realm of OTT & World Cinema.
